headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Test Out New and Unreleased Cars on the Test Track
content:
Before you pull the trigger on your next impulse buy, give it a whirl around the columns of the LS Car Meetâ€™s very own test track. This week, Members can test out the yet-to-be released Karin Sultan RS Classic, the brand-new Pfister Growler, and the Vulcar Warrener HKR, all at no personal cost.

Challenge your friends (or foes) to a Scramble or race against the clock in a Time Trial to see what these babies can really do.
